arStrings.szText:
{icon:bullet} {c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} Up to a {c_random}[SF_0|1]%{/c} chance to inflict {c_important}{u}Vampiric Curse{/u}{/c} on enemies. Afflicted enemies have a {c_number}15%{/c} chance to spread it to other enemies.

{icon:bullet} {c_important}{u}Vampiric Curse's{/u}{/c} stored souls deal {c_random}[SF_6|1]%{/c} increased damage.
